Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To link the skill, you will need to provide the username and password to your Nexia account. You will then select the house on the account that you will be controlling. After that, run device discovery with Alexa and your Nexia devices will appear, ready to control, in your Alexa app.
 
For a connected switch try:
"Alexa, turn on the living room light" 
"Alexa, turn off the living room light" 
 
For a connected lamp module try:
"Alexa, turn on the Bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn off the Bedroom light"
"Alexa, set the Bedroom light to 50%"
"Alexa, brighten the Bedroom light"
"Alexa, dim the Bedroom light" 
 
For a connected thermostat try:
“Alexa, set Kitchen temperature to 72 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature by 4 degrees”
“Alexa, increase Kitchen temperature"
“Alexa, decrease Kitchen temperature”
"Alexa, set Kitchen to cool"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to heat"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to auto"
"Alexa, set Kitchen to off"
 
To use Nexia with Alexa you will need a Nexia account with connected devices. To set up your Nexia account, click the “Sign Up Now” button on the mynexia.com website and follow the instructions. From the Alexa app, open the menu and select Skills. Search for and enable the Nexia skill, then log in with the Nexia account credentials you created previously.
 
You can log in to Nexia at http://mynexia.com, or by using the Nexia mobile app: 
Apple App Store - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/nexia-home-intelligence-for/id431904233?mt=8&uo=4
Google Play Store - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.schlagelink.android&hl=en
